title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements:
(i) Two ‘A’ level passes including Economics in addition to UTME requirements.
(ii) NCE with passes at Merit level in relevant subjects.
(iii) ND/HND at Credit level in a related discipline
(iv) A good pass in JUPEB/IJMB with 5 points and above without an “F” grade will be admitted to 200 level.

(v) Candidates with less than 5 points but not lower than 2 points with not more than one  “F” grade will be admitted to 100 level.

(vi) A University degree in a related discipline.



TRANSFER FROM OTHER UNIVERSITIES


(i) Minimum entry requirements into the desired programme in EDSU

 (ii) SSCE result (or its equivalent)

(iii) JAMB admission letter of current University/school

(iv)Jamb result used in getting admission into current University/School

(v)transcript/certificate from current University/school, which should be forwarded to EDSU
utme_requirements: Five Credit passes at SSCE (or its equivalent) including English Language, Mathematics, Economics/ Principle of Accounts/Commerce/ Principle of Finance and two other social subjects at not more than two sittings
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

title: ANATOMY

(ii) A University degree in a relevant field.

(iv) IJMB/JUPEB

subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics

utme_requirements: Five Credit passes at SSCE (or its equivalent) in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology at not more than two sittings.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: PEACE & CONFLICT RESOLUTION
